name: Banana Crazy
description:
Hi this game is made by me (Nathan Richardson)

I hope you enjoy it even though its a bit short.

I do plan on making more games in the future.

This game was kindda like a test to see if i could make a game in the Blender game engine.

If you want to know more about my games then follow me on twitter: @mrmangomonster

And if you want to see me play some games then subscribe to my Youtube channel: mango monster

And If you want to see some behind the scenes of my games then visit my second Youtube channel: stop-motion mango

I hope you enjoyed the game and I hope it was fun.....
